Projects

Carlos Branco Gym WebPage

Page developed for a bodybuilding enthusiast.

I believe that my knowledge can be acquired by everyone, who somehow seeks help, guidance and encourage those who think that sport is not for them, to set goals and projects for physical and mental satisfaction. There are three fundamental pillars for muscle building: Diet, Training and Rest.
As far as personal goals are concerned, I will continue to strive to learn more about the bodybuilding modality, help those who seek me out about muscle building, nutrition and supplementation. Build a physique that can one day be competitive, in the Mens Natural Bodybuilding contest, in the Master Men's Physique 45-49 category. Continue to compete for Mens Health Portugal projects and others that may arise.
